commit 9c54614a32696f5f63912a6eb0efc4d262c741bc
Merge: 27a22ea8d 8a475ba38
Author: olehhrynyk <olehhrynyk@users.noreply.github.com>
Date:   Fri Feb 17 12:38:35 2017 +0200

    Merge pull request #4 from epam/v1.2
    
    Dlab Release 1.2

commit 8a475ba38d61a8fe748117f78b0fd6262182a706
Author: olehhrynyk <oleh.hrynyk@gmail.com>
Date:   Fri Feb 17 12:30:46 2017 +0200

    Dlab Release 1.2
    
    New features in v1.2
    
    â€¢ Added support of another analytical tool - Zeppelin v.0.6.2
    â€¢ Introduced initial version of user preferences - dashboard filtering
    criteria is now stored into database per user
    â€¢ Added a possibility to Show Active/Show All instances with a single
    click of the mouse
    â€¢ Added support of AWS Signature Version 4q
    â€¢ Instance shapes are now grouped based on T-Shirt sizes (configurable)
    â€¢ User's S3 bucket name, Edge node IP address, type of notebook are now
    displayed on analytical tool details popup
    â€¢ Added "Page not found" component
    Improvements in v.1.2
    
    â€¢ On Notebook Start action - new IP address gets propagated to DLAB in
    cases when notebook has been stopped and its IP has changed in AWS
    â€¢ AWS instance creation is now rolled backed in AWS in cases when AMI
    file creation fails
    â€¢ Added a checksum comparison step for downloading all tar.gz files
    during analytical tool provisioning
    â€¢ Improved logging and error handling in self-service and
    provisioning-service
    â€¢ Improved error handling in boto scripts
    Bug fixes in v.1.2
    
    â€¢ Fixed a problem when terminating EMR for R-studio commented out local
    SPARK_HOME in environment variables
    â€¢ Fixed a problem when 401 response was returned after logout
    â€¢ Fixed couple of security issues in back-end and Node JS codebases
    â€¢ Fixed a problem when termination of infrastructure was failing if
    service base name (SBN) was part of existing SBN
    â€¢ Fixed a rare problem when local kernels failed on "Unable to
    instantiate
    org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.metadata.SessionHiveMetaStoreClient"
    â€¢ Fixed a problem when wrong environment variables were set in case if
    multiple EMR were attached to a notebook
